text: 9Td <cflv <THT wfaqr<uT Th9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 ( 4Raa7, Teq 4Rartt &< <tutf +7qv) 5447 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QH Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Ua 6, 47z-10, ETGT, 78} frri-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPPPICMC/2011 November 02.2011 POLICY MATTER: TECH 92 12011) Sub: Monitoring of PPP Preiects_as per _Guidelines issued _by_Planuing Commission To monitor PPP projects it has been decided in 88th meeting of Executive Committee of NHAI that henceforth the PPP Projects of NHAI shall be monitored in line with guidelines issued by   Planning Commission vide its OM No.N- 140170/10/2009-Infra dated 08.05.2009. Accordingly, () AlL Technical  Divisions   are hereby  directed  for  adopting the monitoring process of the PPP Projects under their jurisdiction as per the enclosed format (ii) PPP  Monitoring Unit (PMU) are hereby created comprising of concerned Regional Officers   (ROs) as head   of PPP PMU and concerned   PD and Manager (Fin.) of the PIU as Members ofPMU. (iii) PPP Project Review Unit (PRU) are hereby created headed by concerned Member  (Technical) Member(Project) and CGM(Technical) of concerned Project and CGM(CMS) as members. This shall be applicable with immediate effect for all PPP Projects of NHAI This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
